bioconda.name: bioconductor-metcirc
bioconda.summary: Navigating mass spectral similarity in high-resolution MS/MS metabolomics data metabolomics data

biotools.summary: This tool comprises a workflow to interactively explore metabolomics data by creating MSP or calculating m/z values and the similarity between precursors.

bioschemas.name: MetCirc
bioschemas.summary: This tool comprises a workflow to interactively explore metabolomics data by creating MSP or calculating m/z values and the similarity between precursors.
